| HistoryText             = The Supreme Soviets were created by the government of the USSR to replace the [[Soviet Super-Soldiers]].  Their first recorded mission was to capture the Soldiers who had defected to the United States.{{r|Captain America Vol 1 352}}

The team later became the [[People's Protectorate (Earth-616)|People's Protectorate]] after the [[Union of Soviet Socialist Republics|Soviet Union]] collapsed.{{r|Avengers Vol 1 319}}{{r|Soviet Super Soldiers Vol 1 1}}
